name: Family Fisticuffs - LoJam 2022
description:
Family Fisticuffs is an Arcade game where you have to break apart your family's arguments before the night is ruined!

Break apart arguments by dashing right between your family and splitting them apart.

~

Left Stick to Move

A to Dash

~

This was created for LoJam 2022 by Cole, Ali, Ayan, Aiden, and Eric.
